patthana18.6:4.1: Hetuṃ saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.6:6.1: Hetuṃ ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.6:8.1: Hetuṃ oghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.6:10.1: Hetuṃ yogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.6:12.1: Hetuṃ nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.6:14.1: Nahetuṃ parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
